page.title: 17BREAKDANCING
page.content:
I sometimes go breaking down the park with Keith, Kevin, John and Stan or Fireball, Showdown, L.O.U. and SPIT! They are our street names. Mine is Locker. There are different moves in breaking like the flare,swipes,turtle, caterpillar, swandive, backspin and kneespin.
{FLARE:}Spin on your back open your legs to 90 degrees and turn over back to the position you started in. {TURTLE:}Tuck your elbows into your stomach, and only hand on the floor. You walk around on the floor with your hands. {BACKSPIN:}It's hard to explain but the average number of spins are 3, 4 or 5. {SWANDIVE:}Start on your feet then jump onto your hands, then chest, then thighs, then knees and then feet.
